thread.title: KERRY BELSON
thread.title_full: Ann Summers Ltd reviewed by KERRY BELSON

author: KERRY BELSON
title: KERRY BELSON
text: I buy regularly from the store and on line. Can not pinpoint any purchase as there are so many. Love this store and its product's. Also if you give your email everytime you spend in store you receive an email later on thanking you for your custom and they give you a cofe to save even more.
